channel.title: Diagnostics Episodic Remix Chalenge
channel.description:
As a celebration and a rework of my 2nd album, I’m going to allow you to remix the entirety of Diagnostics, every single track on it! Every 2 week episode will include the project. Yes you get to mess around with the artwork too!
Send me a DM on insta or send me an email with the link :))
The winner (Obviously the best sounding track) will get a shoutout on my stories and YT
Episode I - Banged my eye-now now underway!!! Enjoy remixing!!
https://app.auxy.co/projects/JhUDnvJ1OET4nSwgQHR7Sw==
Following episodes... Banged My Eye-Bow - January 1 / 15 Escape the Vortex - January 16 / 31 Truly the lies - February 1 / 15 Gentle but harsh - February 16 / 28 Next to no reasons - March 1 / 15 Mr Most’ - March 17 / 31 Bright moon - April 1 / 13 Who else made me - April 15 / may 15 Toasted - May 17 / June 10 Who do you think? - June 15 / 30 Title track - July 1 / 24 ——————————— The winners will be announced on my Instagram!! Watch this space

item.description:
As a celebration and a rework of my 2nd album, I’m going to allow you to remix the entirety of Diagnostics, every single track on it!
Every 2 week episode will include the project.
Yes you get to mess around with the artwork too!
